entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27 except minus 31 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27 except minus 31 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:15 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:15 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
